snippet: The charity created by Wyclef Jean, the Haitian-born hip-hop celebrity, effectively went out of business last month, leaving a trail of debts, unfinished projects and broken promises.
abstract: Charity for Haiti earthquake victims created by Haitian-born hip-hop celebrity Wyclef Jean effectively went out of business in September, leaving trail of debts, unfinished projects and broken promises; millions of dollars in donations never reached the victims.
lead_paragraph: The charity created by Wyclef Jean, the Haitian-born hip-hop celebrity, effectively went out of business last month, leaving a trail of debts, unfinished projects and broken promises.

headline.seo: Quake-Hit Haiti Gains Little as Wyclef Jean Charity Spends Much
headline.main: In Haiti, Little Can Be Found of a Hip-Hop Artist’s Charity
headline.print_headline: In Haiti, Little Can Be Found Of a Hip-Hop Artist’s Charity
